data.event: As of the 2008 national census, the population stood at 16,434.

event.title: discovered in the Sinoe river at Greenville is now

data.event: A hoard of bronze Kru currency rings discovered in the Sinoe river at Greenville is now in the British Museum.

The town was built in about 1838 by colonists of the Mississippi Colonization Society.Part of what was then the Mississippi-in-Africa colony (now Sinoe County), Greenville was named after Judge James Green, one of the first Mississippi Delta planters to send a group of former slaves to Liberia.

event.title: now Sinoe County), Greenville was named

data.event: The town was built in about 1838 by colonists of the Mississippi Colonization Society.Part of what was then the Mississippi-in-Africa colony (now Sinoe County), Greenville was named after Judge James Green, one of the first Mississippi Delta planters to send a group of former slaves to Liberia.
Greenville experiences on average 185 rainy days per year.
